author: Author
about_intro: A free platform to access authentic Islamic books in Urdu, Arabic, and more.
mission_desc: Our goal is to spread the knowledge of Islam by providing free, easy access to Islamic books in digital format. We believe every person has the right to learn about Islam directly from trusted sources in their native language.
benefit_list: Anyone interested in learning authentic Islam
languages_desc: This platform currently supports English, Urdu, and Arabic. You can switch your preferred language using the dropdown on the top navigation bar. The layout automatically adjusts for right-to-left (RTL) support.
future_desc: We plan to add more book categories, author-wise filtering, mobile app support, and audio versions of popular books in future, InshaAllah.
